item.summary: occasional ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException after pressing "reconfigure with XML below"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I've made a change (revision 1568957) to ensure JMX notifications are handled in the AWT event thread. Not sure if this is sufficient, need to take another look later.

Colin, I believe this issue was fixed with the changes in revision 1568957.
Please verify and close (or re-open if you find any issue).
